title: Adults-Only Escape in a Heritage-Listed Country Manor House
description: Discover the charms of historic Warwick, a picturesque town located just under two-hours from Brisbane, staying in an adults-only, heritage-listed manor house: the striking Abbey of The Roses. A sandstone masterpiece dating back to 1891, this beautifully restored hotel, boasting a collection of uniquely decorated rooms, sets the stage for a romantic escape in a charming destination. Included in your escape are an AU$50 beverage credit, a bottle of wine, fine chocolates, a cheese platter to share and a late 11am check-out.
